summary: Gives the \"Spellbreaker\" a worn effect, showing the material beneath the surface. Overall darkens the texture, as well as adds an orange glow to the central orb.
descriptionHtml:
------Darker Worn Spellbreaker
Simple and small texture mod for the Daedric artifact shield called the \"Spellbreaker\"

Installation instructions in the archive, use winRAR to open it.

Gives the shielda worn effect, showing the material beneath the surface. Overall darkens the texture, as well as adds an orange glow to the central orb.

This texture contains some parts of the original one, but they are darkened, and the amount of color has been reduced. Thus, this mod makes the \"Spellbreaker\" look fabulous with darker armors, such as the Nightingale and Dark Brotherhood armors.
author: Rafalema
